00032 // XXX These methods can revisit a descendent more than once....
00033 void CompositeTask::propagate_changes()
00034 {
00035   std::vector<TaskRef>::const_iterator i;
00036   for (i = m_mdp->subtasks().begin(); i != m_mdp->subtasks().end(); ++i) {
00037     const TaskRef &subtask = *i;
00038     subtask->propagate_changes();
00039   }
00040 
00041   m_mdp->propagate_changes();
00042   m_planner->propagate_changes();
00043   m_predictor->propagate_changes();
00044 
00045   // std::cerr << "Policy for task with subgoal: ";
00046   // m_term->debug(std::cerr);
00047   // m_planner->debug(std::cerr);
00048 }
